name: LiveArt
description: LiveArt is the world’s #1 ArtFi ecosystem. LiveArt is a gamified RWA platform that is bringing the world’s top asset classes (starting with the $2T art asset class) to global crypto audiences — all powered by the $ART token. This includes: ● Tokenizing and fractionalizing top RWA masterpieces ($1m-$10m in asset value) ● Art-themed collaborations with the top-25 memecoin projects ● Launching global top-100 iconic artists with market caps over $100m into Web3 ● Games and education offerings about art and other new crypto asset classes (including a Telegram mini-app with over 100k users) ● ArtFi projects (prediction markets, AI generated art market data) ● DeFi products financializing the art asset class (art indices, funds, derivatives, perpetuals)
